definition: Jet Propulsion Laboratory, R&D center in Pasadena, California
pinyin: Pen1 qi4 Tui1 jin4 Shi2 yan4 shi4

definition: State Key Laboratories (university laboratories in PRC supported by the central government)
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Zhong4 dian3 Shi2 yan4 shi4
Bu4 lu3 ke4 hai3 wen2 Guo2 jia1 Shi2 yan4 shi4
containing_words.word: 布魯克海文國家實驗室

pinyin: Bu4 lu3 ke4 hai3 wen2 Shi2 yan4 shi4

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果是，種子不必經過酸處理也可以發芽。

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由羅家文進行實驗探究並將成果彙總並製成研究報告。

sentences.english: Compare the two values we found that they are anastomose essentially.
sentences.chinese: 實驗室試驗數據與仿真結果比較，二者基本吻合。

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用實驗證實了電磁波對生物呼吸過程的影響。

sentences.english: The cases have been laboratory confirmed by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 這些病例已得到達喀爾巴斯德研究所的實驗室確認。

sentences.english: The route and experiments for synthesis of carbazole violet are described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了咔唑紫的合成路線及實驗過程。

sentences.english: The optimum recipe for ginger-cake processing was studied with orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 以正交實驗研究了添加姜粉蛋糕的配方。

sentences.english: An experimental study on the gouge along Xiaojiang fault has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對小江斷裂帶的斷層泥進行了實驗研究。

sentences.english: Each time experiment was performed, he would check and recheck the results obtained.
sentences.chinese: 每次做實驗時，他總是對所獲得的結果檢查兩遍。

sentences.english: The montgolfier brothers began experimenting by filling small paper bags with smoke.
sentences.chinese: 蒙戈爾菲耶兄弟倆最初的實驗是把煙裝進小紙袋。

sentences.english: It is shown that the conducting time of the power converter transistor should not be too short.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明，功率管的導通時間不宜太短。

sentences.english: It has high value in the comprehensive experiments of electronic circuits.
sentences.chinese: 在電子電路綜合型實驗中，有較高的應用價值。

sentences.english: Hand washing sink should be set at the entrance of biosafety laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 生物安全實驗室洗手池設置在實驗室的入口處。

sentences.english: Hand washing sink should be set at the entrance of biosafety laboratories.
sentences.chinese: 生物安全實驗室洗手池設置在實驗室的入口處。

sentences.english: The experiment was carried out using a transversally excited flow CO2 laser.
sentences.chinese: 該實驗是用橫流電激勵CO2激光器進行的。

sentences.english: More experimental deta are needed for the comparison of these two theories .
sentences.chinese: 要比較這兩個理論，尚需待進一步的實驗。

definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
